name: Storm of the 51st
description:
How do you raid a highly secure facility like Area 51? Like this. Uncover the secrets behind this place and learn to use your abilities and transformations. Traverse through multiple stages heavily guarded by soldiers, dogs, and drones using your secret transformations. Oh and did I mention all the spikes and lasers? Yup, this will be challenging but you have to get through them if you want to see what lies within Area 51.

I make short games for my patrons every month, and this is the Game of the Month for July. Every game will also be available for purchase even if you are not a Patron. If you want to support me in my game dev career, check me out on patreon.com/phfaust.
